mapper.insert: insert into ts_term_target (term_id, target_id, weight, term_target_object) values (#{termId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{termTargetObject,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select term_id, target_id, weight, term_target_object from ts_term_target
